short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For use in interacting with the Penumbra blockchain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Penumbra is a shielded, cross-chain network allowing anyone to securely transact, stake, swap, or marketmake without broadcasting their personal information to the world.

Prax wallet allows you to custody your keys, synchronize the blocks, and submit transactions on to the network.

Personal. Private. Practical.
